```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse) # Load needed packages
library(lubridate); library(ggalluvial); library(ggdark)
```


```{r}
# loads income statement
ua_inc <- read_csv('ua_income_statement.csv') # source: Yahoo finance
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ua_inc) +
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = year, y = total_rev, color = 'rev')) +
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = year, y = expense_total_operating, color = 'oper_expense')) +
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = year, y = profit_operating, color = 'oper_profit'))
```
